alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Franklin; Nash; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 5:26PM EDT until July 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Nash County in central North Carolina... West central Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 526 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Nashville to 7 miles southeast of Bunn, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Nashville, Wilson, Elm City, Dortches, Bailey, Bunn, Red Oak, Sharpsburg and Spring Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
